info.en:
Service configuration
Location of nodes
Singapore
Configuration of Servers
Testnet Server
Before Jun 3
1 x Cloud Node（Microsoft Azure D13 V2)
CPU: 8 vCPU Cores
RAM: 56GB
Network: 1000Mbps
Storage: Local SSD 400GB, Managed OS Disk 1TB
Mainnet Server
After Jun 3
1 x Cloud Node (Microsoft Azure E64 V3)
CPU: 64 vCPU Cores
RAM: 1TB
Network - 30Gbps
Storage: Local SSD 1.6TB, Managed OS Disk 2TB
Backup Server
After Jun 3
1 x Cloud Node (Microsoft Azure E64 V3)
CPU: 64 vCPU Cores
RAM: 432GB
Network - 30Gbps
Storage: Local SSD 1.6TB, Managed OS Disk 2TB
Group Introduction
We are dedicated to bringing EOS to the masses. The best way to achieve widespread adoption is through useful, fun, and well-designed products that showcase the best of the EOS platform. And also build and share our tools with the EOS developer community.
Find us on
Telegram
https://t.me/eosmedishares
Steemit
https://steemit.com/@ericfish
info.zh_CN:
服务配置
节点位置
Singapore
服务器配置
Testnet服务器（6月3日前）
1个云节点（Microsoft Azure D13 V2）
CPU：8个vCPU内核
内存：56GB 
网络：1000Mbps 
存储：本地SSD 400GB，托管OS磁盘1TB 

Mainnet Server（6月3日以后）
1个云节点（Microsoft Azure E64 V3）
CPU：64个vCPU内核
内存：432GB 
网络- 30Gbps 
存储：本地SSD 1.6TB，托管OS磁盘2TB 

备份服务器（6月3日以后）
1个云节点（Microsoft Azure E64 V3）
CPU：64个vCPU内核
内存：432GB 
网络- 30Gbps 
存储：本地SSD 1.6TB，托管OS磁盘2TB
团队介绍
我们致力于将EOS带给大众，实现广泛采用的最佳方式是通过有用的，有趣的和精心设计的产品来展示EOS平台的最佳功能。还可以与EOS开发人员社区共享我们的工具。
